item.title: VBA I: Master Production Planning
item.description: Simple automated MPS (Master Production Schedule) sheet with use of forms and VBA. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create an automated MPS System Functionalities: Product list with automatic ID generation and add/remove options. Checks for minimum stock and minimum lot production. Real time graph att. Allow use of both fix and variable lot options. Know Bugs: Alow creation of sheets with forbidden characters.
